title: WZDx v4.0 SwzDeviceFeed
description: The GeoJSON output of a WZDx smart work zone device data feed (v4.0)

features.description: An array of GeoJSON Feature objects which represent field devices deployed in a smart work zone

FieldDeviceFeature.title: Field Device Feature (GeoJSON Feature)
FieldDeviceFeature.description: The GeoJSON feature container for a WZDx field device

id.description: A unique identifier issued by the data feed provider to identify the field device

type.description: The GeoJSON object type; must be 'Feature'

FieldDeviceCoreDetails.title: Field Device Core Details
FieldDeviceCoreDetails.description: The core details—both configuration and current state—of a field device that are shared by all types of field devices

data_source_id.description: Identifies the data source from which the field device information is sourced from

road_names.description: A list of publicly known names of the road on which the field device is located. This may include the road number designated by a jurisdiction such as a county, state or interstate (e.g. I-5, VT 133)

update_date.description: The UTC date and time (formatted according to RFC 3339, Section 5.6) when the field device data was last updated (e.g. 2020-11-03T19:37:00Z)

has_automatic_location.description: A yes/no value indicating if the field device location (parent FieldDeviceFeature's geometry) is determined automatically from an onboard GPS (true) or manually set/overidden (false)

name.description: A human-readable name for the field device

description.description: A description of the field device.

status_messages.description: A list of messages associated with the device's status, if applicable. Used to provide additional information about the status such as specific warning or error message.

road_event_ids.description: A list of one or more IDs of a RoadEventFeatures that the device is associated with

milepost.description: The linear distance measured against a milepost marker along a roadway where the device is located

make.description: The make or manufacturer of the device

serial_number.description: The serial number of the device

firmware_version.description: The version of firmware the device is using to operate

ArrowBoard.title: Arrow Board Field Device
ArrowBoard.description: An electronic, connected arrow board which can display an arrow pattern to direct traffic

is_moving.description: A yes/no value indicating if the arrow board is actively moving (not statically placed) as part of a mobile work zone operation.

is_in_transport_position.description: A yes/no value indicating if the arrow board is in the stowed/transport position (true) or deployed/upright position (false)

Camera.title: Camera Field Device
Camera.description: A camera device deployed in the field, capable of capturing still images

image_url.description: A URL pointing to an image file for the camera image still

image_timestamp.description: The UTC date and time when the image was captured

DynamicMessageSign.title: Dynamic Message Sign Field Device
DynamicMessageSign.description: An electronic traffic sign deployed on the roadway, used to provide information to travelers

message_multi_string.description: A MULTI-formatted string describing the message currently posted to the sign

FlashingBeacon.title: Flashing Beacon Field Device
FlashingBeacon.description: A flashing beacon light of any form (e.g. trailer-mounted, vehicle), used to indicate something and capture driver attention

is_flashing.description: A yes/no value indicating if the flashing beacon is currently in use and flashing

HybridSign.title: Hybrid Sign Field Device
HybridSign.description: A hybrid sign that contains static text (e.g. on an aluminum sign) along with a single electronic message display, used to provide information to travelers

dynamic_message_text.description: A text representation of the message currently posted to the dynamic electronic component of the hybrid sign

static_sign_text.description: The static text on the non-electronic component of the hybrid sign

LocationMarker.title: Location Marker Field Device
LocationMarker.description: Any GPS-enabled ITS device that is placed at a point on a roadway to dynamically know the location of something (often the beginning or end of a work zone)

MarkedLocation.title: Marked Location
MarkedLocation.description: Describes a specific location where a LocationMarker is placed, such as the start or end of a work zone road event

road_event_id.description: The ID of a RoadEventFeature that the MarkedLocation applies to

TrafficSensor.title: Traffic Sensor Field Device
TrafficSensor.description: A traffic sensor deployed on a roadway which captures traffic metrics (e.g. speed, volume, occupancy) over a collection interval

collection_interval_start_date.description: The UTC date and time where the TrafficSensor data collection started. The averages and totals contained in the TrafficSensor data apply to the inclusive interval of 'collection_interval_start_date' to 'collection_interval_end_date'

collection_interval_end_date.description: The UTC date and time where the TrafficSensor data collection ended. The averages and totals contained in the TrafficSensor data apply to the inclusive interval of 'collection_interval_start_date' to 'collection_interval_end_date'

average_speed_kph.description: The average speed of vehicles across all lanes over the collection interval in kilometers per hour

volume_vph.description: The rate of vehicles passing by the sensor during the collection interval in vehicles per hour

occupancy_percent.description: The percent of time the roadway section monitored by the sensor was occupied by a vehicle over the collection interval

TrafficSensorLaneData.title: Traffic Sensor Lane Data
TrafficSensorLaneData.description: data for a single lane within a RoadEvent measured by a TrafficSensor deployed on the roadway

road_event_id.description: The ID of a RoadEventFeature that the measured lane occurs in

lane_order.description: The lane's position in sequence within the road event specified by the 'road_event_id' property

average_speed_kph.description: The average speed of traffic in the lane over the collection interval (in kilometers per hour)

volume_vph.description: The rate of vehicles passing by the sensor in the lane during the collection interval (in vehicles per hour)

occupancy_percent.description: The percent of time the lane monitored by the sensor was occupied by a vehicle over the collection interval

ArrowBoardPattern.title: Arrow Board Pattern Enumerated Type
ArrowBoardPattern.description: a list of options for the posted pattern on an ArrowBoard

FieldDeviceStatus.title: Field Device Status Enumerated Type
FieldDeviceStatus.description: The operational status of a field device

FlashingBeaconFunction.title: Flashing Beacon Function Enumerated Type
FlashingBeaconFunction.description: Options for what a FlashingBeacon is being used to indicate

HybridSignDynamicMessageFunction.title: Hybrid Sign Dynamic Message Function Enumerated Type
HybridSignDynamicMessageFunction.description: Options for the function of the dynamic message displayed by the electronic display on a HybridSign

MarkedLocationType.title: Marked Location Type Enumerated Type
MarkedLocationType.description: Options for what a MarkedLocation can mark, such as the start or end of a road event
